title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: Your privacy is important to us

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.description: We collect information that you provide directly to us:
items: Dog and breeding records you enter
Usage data to improve our service

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
items: Provide and maintain the Breeding Journey service
Send important updates about your account
Improve our platform based on usage patterns

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We use secure authentication and role-based access controls to ensure only you can access your breeding records.

yourRights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
yourRights.description: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
items: Right to access your personal data

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: We use essential cookies to keep you logged in and remember your preferences. We do not use tracking cookies for advertising purposes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@breedingjourney.com
